body_html:
I have in fact only the one version.

ls -l /usr/local/cuda&lib64/libcudnn*
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root        13 Nov 26  2017 libcudnn.so -> libcudnn.so.6*
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root        18 Nov 26  2017 libcudnn.so.6 -> libcudnn.so.6.0.21*
-rwxr-xr-x 1 root 154322864 Nov 26  2017 libcudnn.so.6.0.21*
-rw-r--r-- 1 root 143843808 Nov 26  2017 libcudnn_static.a
body_text:
I have in fact only the one version.
ls -l /usr/local/cuda&lib64/libcudnn*
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root        13 Nov 26  2017 libcudnn.so -> libcudnn.so.6*
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root        18 Nov 26  2017 libcudnn.so.6 -> libcudnn.so.6.0.21*

-rw-r--r-- 1 root 143843808 Nov 26  2017 libcudnn_static.a
body:
I have in fact only the one version.
```
ls -l /usr/local/cuda&lib64/libcudnn*
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root        13 Nov 26  2017 libcudnn.so -> libcudnn.so.6*
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root        18 Nov 26  2017 libcudnn.so.6 -> libcudnn.so.6.0.21*
-rwxr-xr-x 1 root 154322864 Nov 26  2017 libcudnn.so.6.0.21*
-rw-r--r-- 1 root 143843808 Nov 26  2017 libcudnn_static.a
```
